title: ‘Lawful protests are fine, but free speech doesn’t mean you can break rules’: USC president
description: Kim discusses sustaining USC's long standing relationship with Indian students, their current anxieties, layoffs, Artificial Intelligence in classrooms, and why he believes universities must remain places where difficult conversations are not avoided but encouraged.
content:

title: AI at work: The human edge
description: As artificial intelligence reshapes the workplace, many young people worry about job security while graduating students question the value of their degrees in the employment market. Are there any jobs that are 'AI-safe' anymore?
content:

title: JU Scholars conferred ‘Best Research Paper Award’
description: Excelsior Correspondent JAMMU, Dec 20: At an international conference held on ‘Artificial Intelligence for Innovation, Insight, Integration and Impact for Sustainable Business’ at Chandigarh University in collaboration with Capilano University, Canada, Scholars from the Department of Law at University of Jammu (JU) were awarded Best Research Paper Award. A handout stated that Parul Sharma and Sheetal Priya, PhD Scholars were conferred the award. Under the guidance of Prof. Sanjay Gupta and Dr. Raj Kumar, the Scholars presented a research paper […]

title: Commentary: Open source could pop the AI bubble - and soon
description: Open-source artificial intelligence models are catching up with closed models in terms of performance, says Mark Surman for the Financial Times.
content:
TORONTO: We cannot go a day without people asking: when will the artificial intelligence bubble pop and what will be the cause?
I increasingly think that open-source AI models may be the pin that pops the bubble.

title: Central Asia Looks to Balance Innovation and Legal Control in AI Push
description: Tajikistan is proposing the creation of a regional mechanism to legally regulate artificial intelligence and other new technologies in Central Asia while simultaneously announcing a 15-year national AI development plan and a push for a regional AI center.
content:
